DOC.brief_title: Comparison Three Electroconvulsive Therapy ( ECT ) Techniques Treatment Major Depression
DOC.detailed_description: ECT important treatment severely depressed people respond adequately , intolerant , antidepressant medication . Traditionally , ECT administer one two standard technique : bilateral right unilateral electrode placement . However , technique limit either low efficacy high cognitive impairment . Recently , additional technique ECT administration show promise preliminary study : bifrontal ECT . This study compare technique two traditional ECT technique treat people depressive symptom . Participants study randomly assign receive standard bilateral ECT , high-dose right unilateral ECT , bifrontal ECT index course . Depression symptom , neuropsychological status , quality life measure throughout course ECT treatment , one week , 2-month follow-up visit . This study run 4 year .
